main.name: Adeolu Oluwasegun
main.description: I code, and love building user facing products with React, NextJs and React Native
main.bio: Passionate Mobile and Web Front-end Engineer with about 3 years of experience developing web and mobile apps that are both responsive and Search Engines Optimized(SEO). Progressing knowledge of Javascript/Typescript languages and frameworks such as ReactJs, NextJs for web apps and React Native for cross platform mobile applications. Able to quickly learn and adopt new technologies in a fast paced environment. Extensive knowledge of CSS, SASS, and TailwindCSS for building apps with modern and innovative designs. Looking to work in a team to build apps for actionable decision-making using my technical and analytical skills
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you'd love to be a part of your team

education.description: Graduated with Second Upper Class Honours

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Building user interfaces using ReactJs and NextJs using Test Driven Development.

work.title: Associate Android Developer
work.description: Building android apps using Kotlin and Native android development dependencies.

testimonials.text: Mr. Oluwasegun is such a sweet and admirable mentor to me. He has a knack for encouraging me, yet at the same time challenging me enough to push me out of my comfort zone. Absolutely enjoyed and still enjoying my time with him, I hope more mentees would be able to come under his guidance and learn from him!
Your input to my blog's development is a game-changer for me and my career as a whole. I look forward to having an app developed for me by you soonest, keep it up!
